body: Hey, a lot of people don't know me, so if you'd like to know me better, I'll answer some questions. I guess it's called an AMA or something like that idk lol. Anyways, here's a few starting things. I am 12, so I'm pretty young. I am a male. And, I am applying for avic.us mod. I have been part of the avicus community for a while but I don't know as many people as I'd like too. No one will probably respond to this, because I have no friends xD. Jk i have like 3 1/2. But anyways, ask away. Btw, I have youtube, if you couldn't tell by my name. AND I HAVE A WHOPPING 12 SUBS!
